Articles.Content:
Hi, I am a big fan of gliders and KSP (Of course), and was hoping that if squad/someone could make a Thermal Addon/Mod.

I'm Sure it would be Possible to create a "Lift Generation" Property/Sequence to Wings Etc.

Also: Lift Generated when flying up a Mountain/Hill & coastal Lift.

Thanks.

Edited February 14, 2015 by tetryds

I would mention this to Ferram4, who is the creator of Ferram Aerospace Research (FAR). That mod 'fixes' the atmosphere in KSP to behave realistically. With the stock game potentially invalidating FAR in the next update, he might be interested in this. Mention the idea in the FAR release thread.

Moved to general Add-on Affairs.

You may be interested on this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96031-0-90-Kerbal-Weather-Systems!-Alpha-0-5-3-WIP!-%28Jan-2%29
